alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued November 29 at 11:40AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH tonight... WHAT...Flash flooding is caused by heavy rain throughout the day WHERE...for all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through tonight IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Active trough over the islands will keep heavy showers and thunderstorms through Tuesday. This pattern will elevate the potential for flash flooding. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 1140 Taeao Aso Lua Novema 29 2022 ...O LOO FA`AAUAU LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA SE`IA OO I LE Po Nanei... MAFUAAGA...O tafega ma lologa e mafua mai i timuga mamafa e ono NOFOAGA...mo motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le po nanei AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga ma faititili e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o auala tele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea le osofia o auvai. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o loo i luga o le atunu`u o le a mafua ai timuga mamafa e oo atu i le Aso Lua. O nei timuga mamafa o le a ono fa`atupula`ia ai tafega ma lologa i luga o le atunuu mo le po o totoe. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
